wordGroup: indigenous population 土著，土著居民
indigenous knowledge 本地知识；乡土知识；土著知识

sentences.en: Indigenous foods like salt marsh lamb are in vogue.
sentences.cn: 像盐沼羊肉这样的本土食物正在流行。

sentences.en: Frequently, as in the case of the word hyakkaten, they suggest indigenous origin.
sentences.cn: 通常，就像 hyakkaten 这个词一样，它们暗示着原住民的起源。

sentences.en: In the depths of the French Guyanese rainforest, there still remain unusual groups of indigenous people.
sentences.cn: 在法属圭亚那热带雨林的深处，仍然有罕见的土著人群体。
